docs.text: one would think that david duchovny , star of the cult favorite " x-files " would be very careful in choosing his leading man cinema roles .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: at least one would hope so .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one would be seriously incorrect .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: eugene sands ( duchovny ) is a surgeon so dedicated to his craft that he becomes addicted to amphetamines to stay awake and work more .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it turns out to be a bad plan when he loses a patient and his license while under the influence .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ten months later , in a seedy bar to score synthetic heroin , the doctor gets a chance to ply his trade when assassins gun down a customer .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: using a plastic water bottle and bar tubing , sands operates and saves his life .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: smalltime hoodlum raymond blossom ( timothy hutton ) is impressed with the cutlery skills on his associate .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he kidnaps and then offers down-and-out eugene a position in his organization .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: blossom needs a doctor to patch up gunshot victims that would be problematic at a hospital .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sand's temptation is that this will give him a chance to practice medicine again albeit illegally , big chunks of cash to fuel his habit and close proximity to the gangster's womanfriend claire ( angelina jolie ) , this film's babe factor .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the would-be big time operator is desperately in need of help .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: on the run from russian mobsters ( the bad guys that seem to be all the rage in this year's films ) and trying to cut a pirate software deal with the chinese mafia , blossom is surrounded by blood .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: after a few medical misadventures , the physician grows disenchanted with his employment .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: an encounter with a couple of psycho surfer dudes who threaten to blow him away unless he " fixes " their dead buddy cements his feeling that he is in the wrong line of work .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when the fbi visits and forces him to become an informant , there is no question that he needs to be somewhere else .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: oddly enough , these seem like they could be exciting scenes .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the film disproves that assumption .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: then a bunch of other uninteresting things happen .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: writing this only two days after seeing the film , its a struggle to remember the events .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: you can take that as a solid lack of recommendation .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: for all the coolness that duchovny exhibits in " x-files " , it's a surprise that his big screen presence is so lacking in charisma .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the doctor is particularly bland and dull .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: even the cold turkey bit which is rife with dramatic possibilities come across as banal .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a little chocolate and minor sweats get him through heroin withdrawal .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: like virtually everything else in the film , it's a missed opportunity .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the fox mulder detachment doesn't work here .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: oscar-winner hutton's manic mobster is much more difficult to get a handle on .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: played partially for comedy and partially as crazed killer , blossom almost becomes real , but then sinks into goofiness .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: most of the time hutton looks as if he's searching for his character and coming up empty .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: jolie also makes a few false moves towards creating a three-dimensional human being before giving up and turning into scenery .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the most interesting aspect of her performance is watching her pouty lips threaten to take over the screen .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the rest aren't any better .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: michael massee's eccentric fbi agent never revs up .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one of blossom's henchmen steals a few moments of the show as a quirky gunman reminiscent of val kilmer's doc holliday in " tombstone " .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his two-gunned blasting as he does a bizarre dance is the high point of the film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but that 15 seconds isn't worth sitting through the other 90 minutes .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: first time film director andy wilson ( known for his work on the british television series " cracker " ) appears to be attempting to jump on the " pulp fiction " bandwagon .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the best of these movies combine a sense of style and flash with significant substance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the second-rate ones concentrate on just one of these aspects .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " playing god " does neither well .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the basic idea of the film is solid .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and then it goes nowhere .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: even worse , it plods back and forth , up and down a long and winding road before it ends up nowhere .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: fox fails yet again in his search for intelligent life .
docs.label: negative
